properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:42AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a

* Significant Weather Advisory for...
Northwestern Butler County in south central Kansas...
Eastern Harvey County in south central Kansas...
South central Marion County in central Kansas...
Northeastern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas...

* Until 1215 PM CST.

* At 1137 AM CST...National Weather Service Doppler radar was
tracking a strong thunderstorm with locally heavy rainfall near
Whitewater...moving northeast at 60 mph.

Hail as large as dimes and 40 to 50 mph gusts are possible with this
storm.

* Locations impacted include...
Wichita, Andover, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Peabody,
Benton, Whitewater, Kechi, Eastborough, Potwin, Elbing, Burns,
Northeast Wichita, East Wichita, Newton Airport and Jabara Airport.
properties.instruction:
Be prepared to take shelter in the event the storms intensify and
become severe...or a warning is issued by the National Weather
Service.

Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and cause
localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.

These storms may produce ponding of water on roadways. Listen for
later statements or possible flood warnings...should the risk for
minor low-land flooding become more imminent.
